channel.title: Opinions on JWH-018, 073, and similar
channel.description:
Hello all :D Just wondering if anyone has heard anything recent about these newly discovered synthetic cannabinoids (commonly know as and sold under: "spice" or various "herbal incenses" - herbs laced typically with JWH-018, JWH-073, and JWH-200). Personally I think they are quite similar to ganja and a bunch of fun if your unable to have THC in your system for a while. I understand the danger of dealing with a full agonist but as long as the user is not being irresponsible, it doesn't seem to have too many side-effects. Plus, of course, the benefit of it's legal status. Opinions?
-Dzo (fool up on too much crazy 018)

item.title: Opinions on JWH-018, 073, and similar
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Honestly, I like it but the person who invented it, John W Henry, even said that the long term effects of using it as a synthetic cannabinoid has not been tested and we’ll know how it affects our brain 30 years from now. I’ve heard on grasscity forums of people smoking it for 8 months straight and then stopping has caused diarrhea, nausea, cramps, and other withdrawal symptoms that seem very irregular compared with cannabis.

According to Wikipedia, they say that the withdrawal symptoms are similar to cannabis so there are contradictions everywhere. The only way to know for yourself is to try it, if you like it, cool, just don’t smoke it all the time. I bought a few ounces of Damiana on the web for like 10 bucks, some acetone, a spray bottle, and a gram of powdered JWH018 and made about 4 ounces of my own incense (a few milligrams of pure JWH will fuck you up). I got tired of smoking it and just sold bags, legally, with a Not for Human Consumption sticker on it.

Sold a gram for $10, an eight for $25, mids prices, but I ended up making well over 800 bucks in a very short amount of time.

It responds to the same cannabinoid receptors (CB1, CB2) as THC but in different ratios and it fucks you up the first time you try it because you do not have a tolerance at all towards it. Anyway, my conclusion, it’s awesome, just be careful.

~Ron

Read full topic

item.title: Opinions on JWH-018, 073, and similar
item.dc:creator: @chri5 chri5
item.description:
@chri5 wrote:

Got a 2g sample of some smoking mix (with apparently some of the new WINs), since all the JWH’s in the UK are illegal, and me and a friend tried a bit in a home-made bong and we had to smoke like a whole 3/4 of a G each for me just to feel a bit up. My friend felt nothing… That would have been £40 waisted (even though it is better than most of the green here :P)!

Read full topic

item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

I did space (spice) like a month ago. It fucked me up pretty badly to be honest… I was floating around the room and the high felt similar to acid (from what I’ve heard about acid). I don’t remember much about the night but I woke up in a literal puddle of drool the next morning…
